entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:49 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 02:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
